text: Hi, I'm a physics student with experience in ML and computational physics. Interested in developing a module in Julia geared towards superclusters. (edit) To be more specific I am developing a pi supercluster this summer geared towards simulating fluids/particle collisions/deep learning etc all running tasks programmed in Julia. If anyone has any resources for documentation that might be helpful I would greatly welcome it!

text: Maybe I'm wrong but this looks like many of your ideas are among projects proposed for this year Google Summer of Code. Do you take part in it? <https://julialang.org/jsoc/projects/>
